email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for your crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $50.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for your reply. I can lower the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

$51.25 is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the charter party agreement. Also, can you confirm the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great, I'll prepare the charter party agreement. The vessel's ETA at Rotterdam is 14 October. Laycan remains 15-20 October. I'll send the agreement shortly.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the confirmation. Looking forward to receiving the charter party agreement.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Attached is the charter party agreement for your review. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Sarah
